citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection on 07 March 2024, there was an open, punctured bottle of bupivacaine that had expired on 01
October 2023 in the medication storage cabinet in an operative procedure room. The expired bottle was commingled with
other local anesthetics for use during study procedures and not labeled as expired.
An expired medication may not be safe or effective and is not an appropriate method for the treatment or prevention of
animal health issues. The facility must ensure that methods of treatment, including the medications maintained for use in
animals, are appropriate.
Corrected at the time of inspection. To remain corrected after March 12th, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.33(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
At the time of inspection on 07 March 2024, there was an open, punctured bottle of bupivacaine that had expired on 01 
October 2023 in the medication storage cabinet in an operative procedure room. The expired bottle was commingled with 
other local anesthetics for use during study procedures and not labeled as expired. 
 
An expired medication may not be safe or effective and is not an appropriate method for the treatment or prevention of 
animal health issues. The facility must ensure that methods of treatment, including the medications maintained for use in 
animals, are appropriate. 
 
Corrected at the time of inspection. To remain corrected after March 12th, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
